Interface Shootable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggressiveShip, BasherShip, DrunkaedShip, EnemyShip, HumanControlledShip, RunnerShip, SpaceShip, SpecialShip

    public interface Shootable
    Interface represent the ability to run a shot.
    Author:
    YONI

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LIMIT_SHOOT_PER_ROUNDS
      The shoot can be made only after 8 rounds from shooting.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fire(SpaceWars game)
      Function that responsible of attempt of shooting.
      boolean isFiredAvailable()
      Function that check if it can be a attempt of shooting.

    • Field Detail

      • LIMIT_SHOOT_PER_ROUNDS

        static final int LIMIT_SHOOT_PER_ROUNDS
        The shoot can be made only after 8 rounds from shooting.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • fire

        void fire(SpaceWars game)
        Function that responsible of attempt of shooting.
        Parameters:
        game - - the game will shoot at.

      • isFiredAvailable

        boolean isFiredAvailable()
        Function that check if it can be a attempt of shooting.
        Returns:
        true if so or false if not passed 8 rounds or there is no energy
